price: 128. Ni-Rabbow koo inkittoyseeh koh yuqunxeeh ku-Amri oggole Namma Nurn (Nabii Ibraahim kee kay baxa Nabii Ismaaqil kinnuk) nee Ab, Ni-Samadak (raddik) ummatay koo inkittossaah koh tuqunxeeh ku-Amri oggolta ummat tet Ab, ku-diinih madqooqii kee Cajji taamoomi elle Abna inna nee Barisaay nee uybulluy, toobat nek oggol, Diggah Atu isi Naqoosak toobat oggoltaah keenih Racmata Rabbi kinnitok iyyen.
arabic: رَبَّنَا وَٱجۡعَلۡنَا مُسۡلِمَيۡنِ لَكَ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِنَآ أُمَّةٗ مُّسۡلِمَةٗ لَّكَ وَأَرِنَا مَنَاسِكَنَا وَتُبۡ عَلَيۡنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
